<h3 id="X30305">X(30305) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ANTI-CONWAY AND TRINH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-8*a^2*b*c+2*(b+c)*a^3-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30305) = 3*X(1)-2*X(4315) = 3*X(497)-2*X(5722) = 5*X(497)-4*X(18527) = 3*X(4293)-4*X(4315) = X(4293)-4*X(4342) = X(4315)-3*X(4342) = 3*X(5603)-2*X(22753) = 4*X(5722)-3*X(18391) = 5*X(5722)-6*X(18527) = 5*X(18391)-8*X(18527)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(11438). X(30305) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30305) lies on these lines:
{1,7}, {2,5119}, {3,1387}, {4,1000}, {8,80}, {10,6919}, {11,5657}, {30,3476}, {35,3616}, {36,9778}, {40,3086}, {46,14986}, {55,5603}, {56,6361}, {57,28194}, {65,1058}, {145,10572}, {319,4673}, {12247,13274}, {12248,20586}, {12527,12629}, {12700,17622}, {12740,13199}, {14217,15558}, {15170,15934}, {15172,15935}, {21669,22759}, {24046,28016}, {26129,26364}, {26839,27253}</p>
<p>
X(30305) = midpoint of X(7962) and X(9580)<br>
X(30305) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 4342), (2093, 11019), (3421, 24703), (3474, 999), (4293, 1), (17784, 997), (18391, 497), (30353, 5542)<br>
X(30305) = X(200)-of-inner-Garcia-triangle<br>
X(30305) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 4302, 5731), (4345, 5731, 1), (5731, 30332, 4302)<br>
</p>
